content: Sporting event delegation [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) competed at the [1972 Summer Olympics](/wiki/1972_Summer_Olympics) in [Munich](/wiki/Munich), [West Germany](/wiki/West_Germany). ## Results by event ### [Athletics](/wiki/Athletics_at_the_1972_Summer_Olympics) **Men's 100 metres** - [Yeo Kian Chye](/wiki/Yeo_Kian_Chye) - Heat Two — 10.92s (→ did not advance) **Men's 200 metres** - [Yeo Kian Chye](/wiki/Yeo_Kian_Chye) - Heat Two — 21.89s (→ did not advance) **Men's 5000 metres** - [P. C. Suppiah](/wiki/P._C._Suppiah) - Heat One— 15:36.6 (→ did not advance) **Men's 10,000 metres** - [P. C. Suppiah](/wiki/P._C._Suppiah) - Heat One— 31:59.2 (→ did not advance) **Men's High Jump** - [Nor Azhar Hamid](/wiki/Nor_Azhar_Hamid) - Qualification Round — 2.00m (→ did not advance) ### [Boxing](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1972_Summer_Olympics) **Men's Light-Flyweight** - [Syed Abdul Kadir](/wiki/Syed_Abdul_Kadir) ### [Swimming](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1972_Summer_Olympics) **Men's 100 metres Butterfly** - [Roy Kum Wah Chan](/wiki/Roy_Kum_Wah_Chan) **Men's 200 metres Butterfly** - [Roy Kum Wah Chan](/wiki/Roy_Kum_Wah_Chan) **Men's 200 metres Individual Medley** - [Roy Kum Wah Chan](/wiki/Roy_Kum_Wah_Chan) **Women's 100 metres Backstroke** - [Patricia Li Yin Chan](/wiki/Patricia_Li_Yin_Chan) **Women's 100 metres Butterfly** - [Tay Chin Joo](/wiki/Tay_Chin_Joo) **Women's 200 metres Backstroke** - [Patricia Li Yin Chan](/wiki/Patricia_Li_Yin_Chan) ## Sources - "Official Olympic Reports". *aafla.org*. Archived from the original on 15 October 2006. Retrieved 5 November 2006. - "Official Olympic Reports". *la84foundation.org*. Archived from the original on 12 June 2007. Retrieved 26 June 2012. - Evans, Hilary; Gjerde, Arild; Heijmans, Jeroen; [Mallon, Bill](/wiki/Bill_Mallon); et al. "Singapore at the 1972 München Summer Games". *Olympics at Sports-Reference.com*. [Sports Reference LLC](/wiki/Sports_Reference). Archived from the original on 5 July 2018. Retrieved 16 September 2008. This [1972 Summer Olympics](/wiki/1972_Summer_Olympics)-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore at the 1972 Summer Olympics
